summary: This bill, the "Honoring Civil Servants Killed in the Line of Duty Act," significantly increases and expands death gratuity payments for federal employees, including those in the Foreign Service and certain TSA and VHA employees. It defines eligibility, payment order, and tax treatment for these gratuities. Additionally, it adjusts existing death gratuities for injuries sustained in connection with service with an Armed Force and under title 10; addresses funeral expenses; and authorizes emergency supplemental appropriations for agencies facing increased costs due to covered incidents. It also repeals death gratuity payment authority and requires guidance on agency death gratuity payments.
